title: Verde Pistacchio
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Little bistro located near a public university. Offers healthy food and has vegan choices in a fixed menu. Food is often organic or local, fair trade and well presented. As the place has few tables, booking is suggested. Opened June 2013 by 4 friends.
